page.title: 17GAMES WE PLAY AT SCHOOL.
page.content: We have two playgrounds.One for the infants,ages{4-7},and the bigger one for the juniors ages{7-11.}We also have a field,so when it's dry and sunny we can go in there.It is for all the school.These are some of the games the children in classes{6 and 7}would play.{ {TIG,BULLDOG,NETBALL,FOOTBALL,MADDOG, {HIDE AND SEEK TIG,TIG IN SEMI,FRENCH {SKIP,DUTCH SKIPPING,SKIPPING,CATS {CRADLE,MY DOGS GOT FLEAS,HOPSCOTCH,} {PACKMAN,TIG BEHIND LINES,TIG ON LINES, {STUCK IN THE MUD,PIRANHAS,CHAIN TIG, {TIG OFF GROUND,SCISSORS,CHINESE {WHISPERS,LEAPFROG,TRIP UP,RACES, {ICE-CREAM,MR.WOLF,BUMPER CAR,KISS {CHASE, BUDGE,TIG IN BIKE SHEDS,BLIND {BULLDOG,SUBJECTS,WAR,MATCHSTICKS, {CONVOY,DODGEMS AND FOLLOW MY LEADER.
